positions.title: Full-Stack Developers
positions.description: Due to growing workload, we are looking for experienced and talented Full-Stack Developers to join our fast-paced Engineering team. You will work closely with Product, Design and Marketing to analyze, develop, debug, test, roll-out and support new and existing product features.

positions.title: Frontend Engineer
positions.description: We are seeking a skilled Frontend Engineer to create exceptional user interfaces. You will collaborate with UX/UI designers and backend developers to deliver seamless web experiences.

positions.title: Backend Engineer
positions.description: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs and robust systems. Ideal candidates have experience in Node.js, PostgreSQL, and microservices architecture.

positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description: We are looking for a Product Manager to drive product planning and execution throughout the product lifecycle. You’ll define product vision and work closely with engineering and design teams.

positions.title: Product Owner
positions.description: Collaborate with stakeholders and development teams to prioritize features and deliver customer-centric solutions. Strong Agile experience is preferred.

positions.title: UI/UX Designer
positions.description: We are seeking a creative UI/UX Designer to craft engaging user experiences. You will transform complex problems into intuitive and beautiful designs.

positions.title: Operations Manager
positions.description: Lead our operations team to improve processes, manage logistics, and ensure efficiency across all departments. Prior experience in scaling teams is a plus.

positions.title: Customer Support Lead
positions.description: Oversee the support team to ensure timely and effective responses to customer inquiries. You’ll implement support tools and track key performance metrics.

positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
positions.description: Create and manage digital campaigns across various platforms. You’ll analyze performance metrics and optimize content for lead generation and brand awareness.

positions.title: Content Strategist
positions.description: Develop and execute a content strategy aligned with our brand voice and goals. You’ll work closely with designers and marketing leads.
